definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: It was a probing research on the theory and practice of kinesthesis.
sentences.chinese: 本研究對動覺進行了實證與理論探討。

sentences.english: Sports was the main shaft of the bodily-kinesthetic intelligence in PE.
sentences.chinese: 運動爲肢體動覺智慧體育教學之主軸。

sentences.english: Absent tor reduced vibration sense is the first sign of neuropathy.
sentences.chinese: 振動覺缺失或減弱是神經病變的第一體徵。

sentences.english: The results showed that vibratory sense threshold of the normal group was not correlated with sex and hands.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，正常人振動覺閾值與性別和手別無關。
